description: In Icehouse we marked the v2 API XML support as deprecated.  The log message says it *will* be removed, but should be updated to be more accurate and say *may* be removed, pending finalizing the discussion around it.
title: Note that XML support *may* be removed, not *will* be

comments.content: In Icehouse we marked the v2 API XML support as deprecated.  The log message says it *will* be removed, but should be updated to be more accurate and say *may* be removed, pending finalizing the discussion around it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/84725
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=5d39189df6ecb559c3f8b7e2fa3beff25da9f452
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5d39189df6ecb559c3f8b7e2fa3beff25da9f452
Author: Russell Bryant <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Apr 2 09:33:34 2014 -0400

    Note that XML support *may* be removed.
    
    To be more accurate, note that XML support *may* be removed as early
    as the Juno release.  I think there is still more discussion needed
    around concrete usage data before the removal date is finalized.
    
    Related thread:
    http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2014-April/031608.html
    
    Closes-bug: #1301384
    Change-Id: I0415b50ec0b81bb56f5c0fa13bc6d01f8bec7865
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
